mapper.insert: INSERT INTO decks (deck_id,cat, deck_title, create_date, user_id, recommend, cmt) VALUES (deck_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cat}, #{deck_title}, sysdate, #{user_id}, #{recommend}, #{cmt})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deckSources (decksource_id, deck_id, p_card, o_card, d_card, y_card) VALUES (decksource_seq.NEXTVAL, #{deck_id}, #{p_card}, #{o_card}, #{d_card}, #{y_card})
